EN.histoireText: At the heart of their own European studios, the JNL group has blown a breath of exclusivity over its manufacturing process while attracting great names in architecture; thanks to their talent for tailor-made design and development of one-of-a-kind pieces. Whether they are skilled upholsterers, carpenters, sculptors, metalworkers or technicians, their craftsmen perpetuate an ancestral art that gives a unique charm to each of its creations.

FR.histoireText: Au cœur de ses propres ateliers européens, le groupe JNL a insufflé un vent d’exclusivité sur son processus de fabrication grâce à son talent pour le sur-mesure. Qu’ils soient garnisseurs, ébénistes, sculpteurs, ferronniers ou techniciens, ses artisans perpétuent un art ancestral qui confère un cachet unique à chacune des créations.
